title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] Unable to open a file in another editor if it is already opened in one editor (should give error message)
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If file is already opened in one editor, cannot open in another editor (should give error msg)
OB: When a file is already opened in the workbench editor, if you try to open the same file in another editor by right-clicking and selecting 'Open With -> System Editor', nothing happens. There is no warning message or error message displayed.
EB: However, there should be a warning message displayed informing the user that the file is already open in another editor and asking if they want to proceed with opening it in the system editor.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Close the file if it is already open.
2. Go to the Java Perspective.
3. Open a java file by double-clicking on it.
4. The file is now opened in the workbench.
5. Right-click on the Java file.
6. Select 'Open With -> System Editor'.
7. Observe that no warning message or error message is displayed.
